sources.data_found: AiMOS (DCS) cluster: 252 nodes with 6x NVIDIA Tesla V100 32GiB each; 16 nodes with 4x NVIDIA Tesla V100 16GiB each.
NPL cluster: 40 nodes, each with 8x NVIDIA Tesla V100 32GiB.
NGH cluster: 2 nodes, each with 1x Nvidia Arm GraceHopper Superchip containing 1x H100 GPU with 96GB HBM3e.
FOCI/IDEA cluster details: idea-node-06 has 1x GPU; idea-node-07 has 1x GPU; page states Nvidia Ampere A100 GPUs (VRAM size not specified).

student_data.notes: RPI Computer Science B.S. program page states: "currently have over 1400 undergraduates" (used 1400 as a minimum because the figure is given as "over 1400"). This same page explicitly references "2024 -2025 CS Catalog Information" (link on the page), satisfying the 2024+ requirement. The page does not provide separate, explicit 2024/Fall 2024 headcounts for CS M.S. vs CS Ph.D.; after searching RPI Quick Facts (Fall 2024 overall enrollment), Registrar pages, and CS program pages, no official 2024+ CS graduate (MS-only) or PhD-only enrollment counts were found, so grad_cs_count and phd_cs_count are set to 0.

gpu_resources.notes:
Clusters counted and math:
- AiMOS (DCS): (252 nodes × 6 V100) + (16 nodes × 4 V100) = 1512 + 64 = 1576 V100 total. Source indicates 32GiB on the 6-GPU nodes and 16GiB on the 4-GPU nodes, but output aggregates all as v100_count.
- NPL: 40 nodes × 8 V100 = 320 V100.
- Total V100 across CCI GPU clusters: 1576 + 320 = 1896 V100.
- NGH: 2 nodes × 1 GraceHopper (GH200-class) = 2; recorded under gh200_count (not double-counted as H100 SXM/PCIe).
- FOCI/IDEA cluster: 2 nodes explicitly list 1 GPU each (idea-node-06 and idea-node-07) and the page labels them as Nvidia Ampere A100; VRAM (40GB vs 80GB) and form factor are not specified, so this is estimated as A100 40GB (PCIe) = 2 total.
No RPI sources found indicating A100 80GB, H100 SXM/PCIe, H200, P100, A6000, L40S, or A40 in RPI-managed clusters. [WARNING: Original source was inaccessible, using fallback.]

analysis_notes: Data collected via multi-query approach: separate student and GPU searches.
